name: Character 0
description:
You are welcomed to a strange world full of special characters by Character 0, the first object to ever be created. Guiding you through life, even with experience, Character 0 isn't perfect... 

A text adventure without text, Character 0 takes a novel graphical approach to the refined text adventure genre.

Created over 48 hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018.
